mod.name: Wordo's Mod
mod.credits: Thanks to all of the people in the Discord server for helping!
mod.description: A test mod made by Wordo.

cards.name: Ashes

cards.description:
Exhaust your hand.

Exhaust.

relics.name: Effigy
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain Judgement.
relics.flavorText: There was once a soul here, but it's long gone.

relics.name: Gas Mask
relics.description: When you Exhaust a card, add 1 point to the counter. When you enter a boss combat, heal that much.

relics.name: Obsidian
relics.description: Every 3 combats, choose a Curse card to add to your deck. Can be skipped.
relics.flavorText: A jet black stone, as fragile as the soul.

keywords.name: Ashes
keywords.description: A 1 cost Status card that exhausts.

keywords.name: Barbs
keywords.description: When recieving Attack damage, deal damage back. Removed at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Countdown
keywords.description: Countdown is reduced by 1 each time this card is played. Once the Countdown hits 0, the following effect is activated and the Countdown resets.

keywords.name: Counter
keywords.description: The following effect can only be used a limited number of times.

keywords.name: Cycle
keywords.description: Discard the number of cards shown and draw that many.

keywords.name: Disease
keywords.description: When an enemy attacks, they will take half of the damage they inflicted. If the resulting damage is a fraction, damage is rounded down.

keywords.name: Potency
keywords.description: Increases the multiplier of Judgement. Cleared at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Scourge
keywords.description: When an enemy attacks, they will take all of the damage they inflicted. If the resulting damage is a fraction, damage is rounded down.

keywords.name: Solitary
keywords.description: For each card currently in play (in either discard pile, hand, or draw pile), the following effect occurs.

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: The enemy will not do any actions for one turn.
